meanings.definition: A person or thing that flies.
meanings.sent1: The colorful fliers fluttered in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Birds are natural fliers, soaring high above the trees.
meanings.sent3: The fliers in the air race were all trying to reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: The kite danced like a flier in the strong wind.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's cape billowed behind him as he zoomed through the air like a flier.

meanings.definition: A small handbill or circular used for advertising.
meanings.sent1: The local bakery handed out fliers to promote their new pastries.
meanings.sent2: I found a flier for a yoga class on my doorstep this morning.
meanings.sent3: The fliers for the magic show made everyone curious about the magician's tricks.
meanings.sent4: The flier for the concert was so eye-catching that I couldn't resist attending.
meanings.sent5: The flier about the lost dog had a picture of the adorable pup on it.

meanings.definition: A person who travels by air.
meanings.sent1: The fliers boarded the plane with excitement for their vacation.
meanings.sent2: The business fliers rushed to catch their connecting flight.
meanings.sent3: The fliers in first class enjoyed the extra legroom and amenities.
meanings.sent4: The frequent flier program offered rewards for loyal customers.
meanings.sent5: The group of fliers shared travel tips and stories while waiting at the airport gate.
